events.title: Inaugural Koinonia Salon
events.description: Opening salon for the ORGAN-VI community layer. A structured conversation exploring the relationship between recursive theory (ORGAN-I) and creative practice (ORGAN-II), framed through the lens of community as infrastructure.

events.title: Foundations Reading Group Kickoff
events.description: First session of the Foundations of Recursive Systems curriculum. Participants will read selected passages from the genesis transcripts and discuss the architectural commitments underlying the eight-organ model.

events.title: Adaptive Syllabus Workshop
events.description: Hands-on workshop demonstrating the adaptive personal syllabus system. Participants will generate personalized learning paths and provide feedback on the recommendation engine.

contributions.description: Initial schema, models, migrations, seed data
FastAPI flagship with full route coverage
